Dashboard.description: Summary of program performance, including total members, points issued, and recent redemptions.
Visual charts for member growth, engagement rates, and reward redemption trends.
Log of recent member actions, such as check-ins, reward claims, and challenge completions.

Members.description: List of all enrolled members with details like join date, points balance, and tier status.
Search members by name, email, or activity; filter by tier, location, or engagement level.
Manage tier structures, set point thresholds, and assign benefits for each level.
Download member data in CSV format for external analysis or marketing campaigns.

Rewards.description: View and edit available rewards, including descriptions, point costs, and stock levels.
Track all reward redemptions with details on user, date, and reward type.
Add new rewards like discounts, free pints, or merch with customizable point values.
Configure how points are earned (e.g., per visit, purchase) and expiration rules.

QR Codes.description: Generate and manage QR codes for member login and registration access.
Create and manage QR codes for awarding points to members.

Challenges & Events.description: Monitor ongoing challenges like 'try 5 beers' with participation and completion stats.
Review completed challenges, their outcomes, and user engagement metrics.
Design new challenges with goals, rewards, and duration for member engagement.
Manage QR-based stamps for events like taproom visits or brewery tours.

Analytics.description: Analyze member activity patterns, including check-ins, social shares, and referrals.
View aggregated data on member age, location, and beer preferences.
Evaluate which rewards are most popular and their impact on engagement.
Generate tailored reports based on specific metrics or timeframes.

Settings.description: Update brewery details, branding, and contact info displayed in the program.
Set rules for point earning, redemption limits, and membership terms.
Configure automated emails or push notifications for members and admins.
Manage admin accounts, permissions, and access to the portal.
